briefTitle: Usefulness of Myocardial Deformation Imaging for Trastuzumab-induced Cardiotoxicity
officialTitle: Usefulness of Myocardial Deformation Imaging in Breast Cancer Patients Treated With Trastuzumab for Early Detection of Myocardial Dysfunction
conditions: Left Ventricular Function Systolic Dysfunction, Cardiotoxicity
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* HER2(+) breast cancer, anticipating Trastuzumab therapy

Exclusion Criteria:

* Refusal to informed consent
* Congenital heart disease
* Significant arrhythmia in EKG
* Regional wall motion abnormality (+) in echocardiography
* Poor sonic window
